participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and dedicated, I enjoy challenges and take pride in my work. I'm also friendly and love to share a good laugh.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i'm a construction worker. my favorite band is aerosmith. i've been working since i was sixteen years old.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Passionate and creative, I love expressing myself through music. I am warm and approachable, often finding joy in simple moments.
participant_2.background: i am a country music singer. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks. my favorite band is rascal flats.

content.text: Hey! Are you a construction worker? Because I am.
